channel.title: rat-os/ratos
channel.description: An OS focusing on making klipper more approachable

item.title: PSA: accel_to_decel will change to minimum_cruise_ratio
item.description: Klipper just merged a changed that removes accel_to_decel in favor of minimum_cruise_ratio. RatOS has adapted the minimum_cruise_ratio, so if you have overrides setting max_accel_to_decel you may get an error when updating, in that case change accel_to_decel to minimum_cruise_ratio. This also means that if you update RatOS you need to update klipper as well.
